title: Sions late game bug
body: Sion has a bug late game were he can't use his q or r and it makes him super weak. In order to fix it u have to leave and thts bad. Yall need to fix this

replies.body: Vi has the same bug and has had it for some time where she occasionally bugs and you can't use her q.
I was just coming in here to report the same thing. Sad thing is, enemy team had a Sion that did not have this issue.  Cost us the game for sure.

I got the exact same bug and lost a ranked match cause of that (death cause of the bug then time lost during reconnection...)
Please fix this.
